body_html:
They can be merged together, and then you won't need to worry about the init file hack, either.

The init file hack is about the imports from tensorflow.python.platform.
If it were not to duplicate logic, I could of course get rid of most of them.
But I'm sure I cannot remove tensorflow.python.platform.test.
body_text:
They can be merged together, and then you won't need to worry about the init file hack, either.

The init file hack is about the imports from tensorflow.python.platform.
If it were not to duplicate logic, I could of course get rid of most of them.
But I'm sure I cannot remove tensorflow.python.platform.test.
body:
> They can be merged together, and then you won't need to worry about the init file hack, either.

The init file hack is about the imports from `tensorflow.python.platform`.
If it were not to duplicate logic, I could of course get rid of most of them.
But I'm sure I cannot remove `tensorflow.python.platform.test`.
